name: Dalí Triangle
description: Dalí: painter, thinker, writer, trickster, even pervert… a man of many faces. A genius? That’s for you to decide. But the truth is that Dalí left a significant mark on the Girona area. It’s amazing to see his houses, his museum and his belongings this close up. Actually, there are three spots that compose the surrealistic Dalí triangle
